mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.template_id AS "templateId", a.title AS "title", a.content AS "content", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM dy_template_message a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.template_id LIKE '%'||#{templateId}||'%' '%'+#{templateId}+'%' concat('%',#{templateId},'%')
AND a.title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' '%'+#{title}+'%' concat('%',#{title},'%')
AND a.content LIKE '%'||#{content}||'%' '%'+#{content}+'%' concat('%',#{content},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dy_template_message( id, template_id, title, content, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{templateId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE dy_template_message SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
